channel.title: [Development]DoomScape-317
channel.description:
Im making a brand new 317 server with many features already in and to be added
Source I started with was Dodian Now its DoomScape :)
Features: All Skills But Farming Trainable Barrows(not real) 85% Magic 90% Range 95% Melee 80% Prayer 15% Real Spawns 1% Real Drops New Items including skillcapes and more Dueling
ToDo List: Castlewars Mage Arena Real Barrows 100% Magic 100% Range 100% Melee 100% Prayer Farming 100% Real Rs Spawns 100% Real Rs Drops Real Agility graphics 100% Agility ShortCuts with Graphics Custom Quests
Items To Add: DragonClaws-None Delta Dragon PlateBody-None Delta
Wanted Done For Beta: Farming 50% Real Rs Spawns 50% Real Rs Drops a Few quests 2% Agility ShortCuts Real Barrows Dueling
ScreenShots:
Varrock-Its not fully spawned just yet [img]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a117/wildjjbug/varrock.jpg[/img]
Thieving- Just graphics [img]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a117/wildjjbug/thievinggraphics.jpg[/img]
Pvp- I have to Fix the attack animations [img]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a117/wildjjbug/pvp.jpg[/img]
Pvp- GraveStones Drop when you die in pvp [img]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a117/wildjjbug/gravestones.jpg[/img]
Falador-Not fully spawned just yet [img]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a117/wildjjbug/falador.jpg[/img]
SkillCapes-I just added all these new items, dodian did not have any other these but firecape and a few others [img]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a117/wildjjbug/Skillcapesandstats.jpg[/img]
Quests- Im working on getting alot of the normal rs quests working :) [img]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a117/wildjjbug/Quests-1.jpg[/img]
Home- This will be the home for ever [img]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a117/wildjjbug/Home-2.jpg[/img]
99Stats- when ever someone gets a 99 it will be Announced [img]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a117/wildjjbug/Announced99.jpg[/img]
StaffList: Leader-Wildjjbug co-leader-none
Coders: Wildjjbug
Releases: SpawnList-[url=http://"http://uppit.com/v/OYHTFJNR"]ClickHere[/url](will Update as i get more added) DropList-Coming Soon ServerFiles-Coming Soon
As goes for releasing my files, i will be releasing them with less stuff done than the one i will be hosting
